# Subject

Sebastien will be presenting the paper [*Quality Issues of Implied Volatilities of Index and Stock Options in the OptionMetrics IvyDB Database*](https://dx.doi.org/10.2139/ssrn.4025257) by Martin Wallmeier. This paper discusses problems related to the OptionMetrics database and how to solve them.
